full_summary:
================[]
### DEFENCEX Summary of Feedback and Outcomes for RFIs 3-4-5 

* **Reference Number**: WS3189418126-Doc4568553852
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3189418126
* **Publication Date**: May 3, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**:  May 24, 2024, 2:00 pm EST
* **Trade Agreements**: The requested tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, open bidding
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

### Notice Information

* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Notice Type**: None
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Forest, Alex
	+ Email: [alex.forest@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alex.forest@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Department: Defence Contracting Authority

### Contracting Entity and End User

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User**: Department of National Defence (DND)

### Tender Description

The DefenceX project is releasing the Summary of Feedback and Outcomes document to provide clarification on feedback from RFIs 3-4-5. The RFIs were issued on July 4, 2023, November 9, 2023, and November 20, 2023. The document contains a summary of the feedback and responses.

Note that I changed the formatting to make it easier to read, and the language is more professional. I also condensed some of the information to fit the 400-word limit. Let me know if this meets your requirements! 

Please let me know which content should be included in a documentation, an email, speech, presentation, etc.
